chapters.title: Chapter 29:  The Last Knot
chapters.info:
Thad Torfinn,
      p. 638â€”Skinny man from Emond's Field.
      He and Jon Ayellin dispute the
      boundaries of their farms.  He rarely leaves his farm except to go to
      Emond's Field.  However, he was convinced to leave with
      Tam to help Perrin.
